mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Gift Suggestions for Square Dancers", "The Caller's Primer: Sound Systems, Part 1, by Roland T. Onffroy", "'And LIselotte Looked Around Silently-Forward, Backward, Round About'", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Americana: Devilish Mary, by Terry Golden", "Style Series: Visualizing a Dance-The H (Bunkhouse Reel)", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Workshop", "Western Caller's Coloring Book", "Homes for Dancing: Pioneer Cabin", "Experimental Lab: Time to Evaluate", "Caller of the Month: Vaughn Parrish", and "Paging the Roundancers: Howard and Vera Lauck".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
